body.name: KEJOG Projector Native 1080P Mini Projector with WiFi and Bluetooth Support 4K Portable Projector Outdoor Home Theater Video Proyector Compatible with iOS/Android/Windows/TV Stick/HDMI/USB

features: ★ 【Breathtaking Visual Experience and Support 4K】 With its amazing 12000 lumens brightness, native 1080P Full HD resolution, and high contrast ratio of 10000:1, the KEJOG portable projector brings an unparalleled visual feast. Every detail is vividly presented in vivid colors and sharp contrasts, allowing you to immerse yourself in a vivid world of images. Whether it's an outdoor movie night or an indoor home theater experience, you can create unforgettable memories with family and friends wherever you go.

★ 【Immersive 150-inch Big Screen Experience】 Enjoy movies, games, and sporting events on the massive 150-inch projection screen. Choose your ideal viewing position for a captivating visual feast with flexible mini projection distances (2.6 - 12.5 feet). The projector is equipped with a powerful cooling system with wifi and bluetooth, which extends the lamp life to 100,000 hours, ensuring long-lasting performance.

★【Low Noise, Superb Dolby Audio Quality】 Outdoor projector thanks to advanced noise reduction technology, fan noise is reduced by 80%, allowing you to immerse yourself in every cinematic moment without distractions. The built-in speakers deliver clear audio, and with support for Dolby audio technology, the sound quality is exceptional. For an even more immersive audio experience, easily connect external speakers.

★【Multiple Device Connectivity, Endless Entertainment】 Mini projector is equipped with Wi-Fi, USB, HDMI, and other interfaces, seamlessly connected to a wide range of devices. Whether it's smartphones, tablets, laptops, or gaming consoles, enjoy a smooth playback experience of your favorite videos, photos, and games.

★【Portable Design, Easy Setup, and 5-Year Warranty】 The compact and lightweight design of KEJOG Portable Projector makes it perfect for outdoor movie nights or indoor home theater experiences. Mini proyector económico with features like vertical correction and adjustable focus, setting up is a breeze. Home theater projector comes with a remote control for convenient operation. Additionally, it is backed by a 5-year warranty, ensuring your satisfaction and peace of mind.

Can I play Netflix, Prime Video, Hulu, etc? Due to HDCP copyright issues, Copyrighted videos such as Netflix / Disney / Hulu / Amazon Prime Video must be played through a TV box (not included). Can I connect my phone with a cable？ It can be wired to an Android phone/iPhone, and it can also be wirelessly connected via WiFi Can I use it for business presentations? You can use it for business presentations, but we recommend that you use a video projector in a dark environment to fully enjoy its features.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I checked this out in my video room and it was bright enough for my 100 inch drop down screen. I used the HDMI input via a laptop and projected Amazon Prime Video. After some adjustments to contrast and brightness and color saturation the image was decent for standard resolution. I connected the projector easily to the internet and the menu's were easy to follow so overall for the price it seemed pretty good. This projector will be a nice addition to business presentations from a laptop when ocassionally needed and as it's so light and compact it will be easily toted and used on-the-fly. For the negatives: The supplied tripod needed a little swivel ball, which I had a few and added one and was able to fully adjust the units tilts etc. The remote control worked well provided you aimed it at a precise angle toward the front of the unit. I can't speak to how robust the unit will be over time it is very small and light in weight so more usage will tell. For the very modest price it will fit a niche with us, so I'm happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Setting up this item is a pain!
reviews.reviewText: If you try to set up by wireless it is hard, the code screen shot won't even open. I think it is something people should know before buying this product, that the rest of the reviews leave out. The remote control barely works too and am right near the projector!

reviews.reviewText: The Projector that Transforms Any Space! Immerse yourself in cinematic brilliance with this cutting-edge device. Its high-definition projection and user-friendly features redefine home entertainment. From movie nights to presentations, the versatility and clarity are unmatched. Compact yet powerful, it effortlessly turns any room into a captivating theater. Elevate your visual experience with this top-notch projector—your gateway to endless entertainment and professional presentations. Unleash the magic of projection

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little projector. Easy to setup .
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I was pleasantly surprised by the value and quality of this mini projector. This budget-friendly projector exceeded my expectations. The video quality, especially with the lights off, is excellent.Setup was a breeze, and while you could use your phone, I found it more convenient to pair it with a Firecube and my sound systems. The projector has many settings to ensure you are pleased with the quality of the video. I can use the remote from anywhere in the room without any problems.Overall, I'm thrilled with this purchase – a compact, affordable projector that adds a touch of cinematic magic to my living room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not compatible with MacBook or iPad
reviews.reviewText: I have been wanting a projector for movie nights so when I saw this pre-order deal I snagged it. Setting it up right out of the box I was a little intimidated at first but it was all super easy. There is a remote (batteries not included) there is an hdmi cable, a power cable and an included tripod!The screen was user friendly and easy to navigate, especially with the remote. You have to point it directly at the projector at all times, it's not going to pick up if you point away or nearby like some tv remotes. There are buttons on top that will also navigate the screen if need be.The picture quality is crips, good colors, and bright. I turned it on in my dining room with window blinds open and did not have any problem with visuals whatsoever. To adjust the blurry screen you can either move the projector backward or forward, depending on how big or small you want the picture. Then turn the knob either right or left for sharpness. The knob was a little difficult to rotate, for me, but it worked fine.The fan noise is loud though, like distractingly loud. The volume on the projector is pretty good for indoors, it goes pretty high.Everything about this projector was going smoothly until I tried to use the screencast with my iphone. The manual kept saying to use your phone. Idk if this is a phone only projector but it was not screen casting with my iPhone, even though it says iPhone and android friendly. Anything I tried to screencast only registered as "music". Even personal videos from my photos app. So that was annoying.Then I pulled out my spare hdmi to usb-c cable to try my MacBook. When you are setting up a "wired connection" the manual says to just plug it in. That's what I did but nothing showed on the projector.THEN I tried to connect my iPad Air, the same thing happened. Plugged it in like the directions on screen said, no picture popped up. By this point I am annoyed and over it. Moments gone. I am thinking this is really meant only for androids or strictly for playing music. There is also an option to use a usb drive with downloaded movies or music, but no one does that anymore. Everything is through bluetooth or screen sharing. This projector is useless to me now. Very disappointing. See pics for reference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mini but Mighty
reviews.reviewText: This mini projector is great! The quality of the imaging is excellent. so bright and vibrant even with the lights on, you can still clearly see what's being displayed.It's pretty straight forward in terms of use and comes with a lil tripod stand which I love.For cellphone connectivity however I though it was through Bluetooth, but it took me a second to realize that you can really only mirror the display on your cellphone. So for iPhone it's through airplay.Overall a really good projector at an amazing price.I'm happy with this purchase
